title: War Of The Roses: Is He Sneaking Around With His Coworker?
description:
This isn’t the first time he cheated, it’s just the first time in a long time that he’s been caught.
She contacted The Bert Show years back when his loyalty first became an issue, but things had worked themselves out, and she no longer needed us.
It’s been a few years since the original incident, her husband was offered a promotion that came with a move out of state, she’s gotten connected with some great friends and she found a job that she loves, but, for the past couple of months, things have been a little weird.
Her husband has been working late on important projects and also working a lot on weekends. Of course, this gave her some reserve, considering his history with infidelity but she tries to leave those thoughts behind.
She recently found out that the old coworker he cheated on her with the first time just relocated to a position in the state they moved to, and here’s the kicker, she’s been working there for the past couple of months and he never told her.
